TopicTitle: Training "Go For Orbit" - No target marker visible

Articles.Content: I'm trying to do the training scenario "Go For Orbit" and it says to follow the target marker. But I cannot see that marker anywhere on the navball. It also says that you can enable S.A.S. and set the mode to Target. If I do this, either the rocket just goes straight up or topples over almost immediately. What am I doing wrong?
Hmmmm. Sounds like your tutorial file is corrupted. Did you get the game from Steam? Have you done a file verification on the game?
